meanings.definition: To become luteinized: to undergo a process in which cells develop lutein
meanings.sent1: After a while, the cells luteinized, changing their appearance.
meanings.sent2: The plant luteinized as it absorbed more sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The cells decided to throw a party when they luteinized, celebrating their new look.
meanings.sent4: As the cells luteinized, they embraced their vibrant transformation like a caterpillar turning into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The process of luteinization made the cells shine like tiny jewels under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Luteinized: having been transformed into lutein
meanings.sent1: The luteinized petals of the flower stood out in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The leaves appeared luteinized after the plant absorbed the nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The luteinized fruit looked like little bursts of sunshine on the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with a luteinized glow, captivating everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The luteinized color of the sky during sunset painted a breathtaking scene.

meanings.definition: Luteinized: characterized by the presence of lutein
meanings.sent1: The luteinized cells showed a distinct yellow hue under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The luteinized vegetables were known for their health benefits.
meanings.sent3: The luteinized walls of the room gave it a warm and inviting feel.
meanings.sent4: His luteinized skin tone indicated a diet rich in lutein-containing foods.
meanings.sent5: The luteinized landscape was a sight to behold, with vibrant colors everywhere.
